mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id AS reviewId, r.accommodations_id AS accommodationsId, r.user_id AS userId, r.author_name AS authorName, r.rating, r.content, r.created_at AS createdAt FROM review r WHERE r.accommodations_id = #{accommodationsId} AND r.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
SELECT review_image_id AS reviewImageId, review_image_url AS imageUrl, sort_order AS sortOrder FROM review_image WHERE review_id = #{reviewId} ORDER BY sort_order, review_image_id

SELECT rt.review_tag_id AS reviewTagId, rt.review_tag_name AS reviewTagName FROM review_tag_map rtm JOIN review_tag rt ON rtm.review_tag_id = rt.review_tag_id WHERE rtm.review_id = #{reviewId} AND rt.is_active = 1 ORDER BY rt.review_tag_id
SELECT review_tag_id AS reviewTagId, review_tag_name AS reviewTagName FROM review_tag WHERE is_active = 1 ORDER BY review_tag_id
